Class CreatureView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • CreatureView

  • public class CreatureView
extends View
    The CreatureView class represents the view for displaying information about creatures in the game.

        mainFrame, mainPanel, subPanel, titleLbl

        Parameters:
        mainPanel - The main panel to which this view belongs
        CInventoryModel - The InventoryModel associated with the view
        strCreatureLbl - The label for the creature view
        bSet - A boolean indicating whether to set creature information or not
